member.name: OLS
member.remarks: Ordinary least squares (OLS) is a parameterized regression method. It assumes that the conditional mean of the dependent variable follows a linear function of the dependent variables. The parameters of the regressor can be estimated by minimizing the squares of the difference between observed values and the predictions.

member.name: SymSGD
member.remarks: Stochastic gradient descent (SGD) is an interative algorithm that optimizes a differentiable objective function. SYMSGD parallelizes SGD using Sound Combiners.
